moveCarQRCPage.subtitle: It's free and can be modified. Paste the QR code on the car window and you can contact the car owner by scanning the QR code.
moveCarQRCPage.indexInputPh: Type in phone number to generate QR code
moveCarQRCPage.callCarOwnerContent: Are you sure you want to call the car owner?
moveCarQRCPage.sendEmailContent: Are you sure you want to send an email notification to the car owner?
moveCarQRCPage.addWechatIdContent: Are you sure you want to add the car owner's WeChat account?
moveCarQRCPage.deleteThisMCQRC: Delete this Move Car QR code
moveCarQRCPage.deleteThisMCQRCContent: Are you sure you want to delete this Move Car QR code?
moveCarQRCPage.createQRCAfterLogin: You are not logged in yet. You can create a QR code for moving the car after logging in.
moveCarQRCPage.usageDays: This QR code has been used for {{day}} days and has been scanned {{scanCount}} times~
moveCarQRCPage.template1: Scan the QR code to move the car

fileTransferPage.subtitle: Files can be transferred between various devices freely and conveniently.

ipPage.pageTitle: Search IP or Domain Name Details
ipPage.subtitle: You can query IPv4, IPv6 and geographical location of IP or domain name for free.

stopwatchPage.subtitle: A free online stopwatch that works on any device

tripPage.subtitle: Using GPS, you can conveniently record route trajectory, speed, mileage, altitude and other travel data~

dateCalculatorPage.subtitle: Use this date calculator to calculate the number of days between two dates.
